item.title: Event tracking - Google Analytics
item.description: What is event tracking? In simple terms, it logs events that happen on your site, for example rate a post (If you have post rating), download a file… or you do some sort of JavaScript processing that you want to measure. So finally, we can keep track of AJAX interactions with the server, we can log also normal POST requests that do some php processing, like posting a comment, or editing some data in our database.
